items.title: Frictionless Data and Dryad join forces to validate research data
items.summary: A great way to share research data is to upload it to a repository, but how do we ensure that uploaded data doesn't have issues? Frictionless Data and Dryad join forces to revamp the upload page for the Dryad application, now including the Frictionless validation functionality to check for data quality.
